title: Irina Sindler
subtitle: Irina Sindler, supposedly a candidate for the 2007 Nobel Peace Prize, is credited with saving 2,500 Polish Jews from the Holocaust.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Irina Sindler, thanks to the rescue of 2,500 Polish Jews from the Holocaust, was a candidate for the 2007 Nobel Peace Prize but lost in front of Al Gore.
